warezcdn.name: Star vs. As Forças do Mal
warezcdn.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil

imdb.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil
imdb.plot: Star Butterfly arrives on Earth to live with the Diazes, a Mexican-American family. She continues to battle villains throughout the universe and high school, mainly to protect her extremely powerful wand, an object that still conf...

episodes.title: Episode dated 24 April 2023
episodes.plot: Star has a plan to go back on Earth and makes a portal of her own and she doesn't know it leads to something darker than Magic

episodes.title: Flu of a Star
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Butterfly Follies
episodes.plot: Followed by the conclusion from before, many more affairs ensue within the land of Mewni and in the world of those influenced.

episodes.title: Escape from the Pie Folk
episodes.plot: Star continues to search for her mother, which brings her to the home of the Pie Folk.

episodes.title: Moon Remembers/Swim Suit
episodes.plot: Queen Moon slowly regains her memories as she meets people from her past. Star's planned beach day is interrupted by a fight between Eclipsa and Rhombulus.

episodes.title: Ransomgram/Lake House Fever
episodes.plot: When Star re-creates Marco's room, he's delivered a ransomgram revealing that Nachos has been stolen. A storm forces Star to spend more time with the Lucitor family.

episodes.title: Yada Yada Berries/Down by the River
episodes.plot: When Eclipsa decides to make a breakfast with monsters party, the oatmeal she was eating had Yada Yada berries that turn people into stone making Star obsessed to find the person responsible. Moon and River are living happily in the woods doing nothing, after a new family comes near them after they where kicked out of their home by monsters.

episodes.title: The Ponyhead Show!/Surviving the Spiderbites
episodes.plot: Star enlist Ponyhead to help make Eclipsa more popular.

episodes.title: Out of Business/Kelly's World
episodes.plot: Star, Marco and Janna want to take full advantage of Quest Buy's "Going Out of Business Sale." Marco and Kelly risk life and limb to return a library book before it's overdue.

episodes.title: Curse of the Blood Moon
episodes.plot: Star and Marco go on a perilous quest to break the curse of the Blood Moon.

episodes.title: Princess Quasar Caterpillar and the Magic Bell/Ghost of Butterfly Castle
episodes.plot: Ludo wants to forget his past and move on with his life. Moon returns to the ruins of Butterfly Castle to find something she left behind, but gets more than she bargained for.

episodes.title: Cornball!/Meteora's Lesson
episodes.plot: Star tries to convince Buff Frog to move back to Mewni. Glossaryck needs Meteora to help him with an errand.

episodes.title: The Knight Shift/Queen-Napped
episodes.plot: Star and Marco have to make some decisions about the future. Star and Marco have to rescue a queen-napped Eclipsa.

episodes.title: Junkin' Janna/A Spell with No Name
episodes.plot: Tom learns how to have fun without Star. Star and Eclipsa's spells come face to face, and they must team up to stop a lethal spell gone rogue.

episodes.title: A Boy and His DC-700XE/The Monster and the Queen
episodes.plot: Marco and Tom go on a dragon-cycling adventure. Eclipsa has a date with Globgor!

episodes.title: Cornonation
episodes.plot: Star wants Eclipsa to be coronated Queen!

episodes.title: Doop-Doop/Britta's Tacos
episodes.plot: Star and Tom prepare for their big trip but first must say goodbye to everyone. Marco tries to finish his punch card for Britta's Tacos.

episodes.title: Beach Day/Gone Baby Gone
episodes.plot: Marco and Star go to the beach. Marco babysits Meteora and Mariposa but loses them to another dimension.

episodes.title: Sad Teen Hotline/Jannanigans
episodes.plot: Tom returns from his vacation to break up with Star but they aren't prepared for the consequences. Tom, Marco and Star seek out Janna to return to Mewni.

episodes.title: Mama Star/Ready, Aim, Fire
episodes.plot: Star, Marco, Janna, and Tom lose their memories as they traverse amnesia-inducing waters to get back to Mewni. Star arrives in Mewni as a super soldier attacks Monster Castle.

episodes.title: The Right Way/Here to Help
episodes.plot: The battle on Mewni continues. Moon arrives to join the fight.

episodes.title: Pizza Party/The Tavern at the End of the Multiverse
episodes.plot: Moon and Mina agree to disagree. Star searches for a way to defeat Mina and her Solarian Warriors.

episodes.title: Cleaved
episodes.plot: Star and Marco face their final conflict.

episodes.title: Battle for Mewni: Return to Mewni/Battle for Mewni: Moon the Undaunted
episodes.plot: When Star returns to her home dimension, she discovers that magic is disappearing throughout the kingdom. Star must dig deep and challenge her arch nemesis Ludo in an effort to save her family and kingdom.

episodes.title: Battle for Mewni: Book Be Gone/Battle for Mewni: Marco and the King
episodes.plot: Despite dire warnings, Ludo tries to write a new chapter in the Book of Spells. King River cannot keep up the kingdom without Queen Moon.

episodes.title: Battle for Mewni: Puddle Defender/Battle for Mewni: King Ludo
episodes.plot: Buffrog helps Star escape from Moon's ever-protective watch. With Ludo in control of the kingdom, Marco must decide his next move.

episodes.title: Battle for Mewni: Toffee
episodes.plot: King Ludo's reign reaches as a tipping point as Star returns to the castle. Star must summon her strength to save her family and the kingdom.

episodes.title: Scent of a Hoodie/Rest in Pudding
episodes.plot: Star secretly keeps Marco's hoodie as a reminder of their friendship and is not ready to let him go. Star has recurring visions of Glossaryck and believes he's haunting her.

episodes.title: Club Snubbed/Stranger Danger
episodes.plot: Tom snubs Star at the Silver Bell Ball. Star meets the ancient Queen Eclipsa.

episodes.title: Demoncism/Sophomore Slump
episodes.plot: Star and Tom's relationship is put to the test when Tom decides to get rid of his demons! Marco decides to put in a full effort to living life in the present on Earth.

episodes.title: Lint Catcher/Trial by Squire
episodes.plot: Sir Lavabo, knight of the wash, gets a new squire. Star prepares for Quest Buy's Midnight Warrior Blowout Sale.

episodes.title: Princess Turdina/Starfari
episodes.plot: A surprise visitor forces Marco to reveal Turdina's true identity. Star tries to understand why Mewmen treat monsters unfairly.

episodes.title: Sweet Dreams/Lava Lake Beach
episodes.plot: Star discovers she travels through multiple dimensions in her dreams. Kelly breaks up with her boyfriend and Marco questions his friendship with Star.

episodes.title: Death Peck/Ponymonium
episodes.plot: Star urges the royal youth of Mewni to sign a petition calling for the equal treatment of Monsters. Star is thrilled when Ponyhead invites her to dinner with her sisters.

episodes.title: Night Life/Deep Dive
episodes.plot: Star learns that Marco and Hekapoo have been dealing with rogue interdimensional portals. When Star's sleep-portaling becomes dangerous, she decides to end it.

episodes.title: Monster Bash
episodes.plot: Star throws a party at the ancient Monster Temple to celebrate Monsters and Mewmans living together in harmony.

episodes.title: Stump Day/Holiday Spellcial
episodes.plot: Marco tries to throw Star a surprise party; Eclipsa's dark spells are invited to an office holiday party.

episodes.title: The Bogbeast of Boggabah/Total Eclipsa the Moon
episodes.plot: The Bogbeast of Boggabah: King River takes Star on a hunting trip to find the mystical Bogbeast of Boggadah. Total Eclipsa the Moon: Queen Moon enlists Eclipsa to help her access Mewni's most guarded records.

episodes.title: Butterfly Trap/Ludo, Where Art Thou?
episodes.plot: Moon and the Magic High Commission put Eclipsa on trial for her evil past. Dennis goes on a journey to find Ludo living in another dimension.

episodes.title: Is Another Mystery/Marco Jr.
episodes.plot: When Buff Frog goes missing, Star goes in search for him. Marco returns to Echo Creek to learn that his mom is pregnant.

episodes.title: Skooled!/Booth Buddies
episodes.plot: PonyHead goes back to St. O's and finds that the curriculum is tougher. Star and Marco get trapped together inside of a malfunctioning magical photo booth.

episodes.title: Bam Ui Pati!/Tough Love
episodes.plot: Ponyhead avoids her friends and family to watch the finale of her favorite Korean drama. Eclipsa and Moon work together to try and bring Meteora home peacefully.

episodes.title: Divide
episodes.plot: As acting queen, Star sends Marco and his warriors to stall Meteora while she goes on a mission to find Moon.

episodes.title: Conquer
episodes.plot: Star needs to find a way to face off against Meteora alone, and in the process she must make a decision that will change Mewni forever.

episodes.title: My New Wand!/Ludo in the Wild
episodes.plot: When Star Butterfly destroys her wand to save her best friend Marco Diaz, a new unicorn takes place of the dead one. Now Star only has half of the star on her wand and it has been cleaved. She needs all the pieces of the wand but the other half was lost in the explosion. Join Star and Marco in their new adventure ahead!

episodes.title: Mr. Candle Cares/Red Belt
episodes.plot: Star rebels after the school guidance counselor insists her future is set in stone. Marco wants to get his life on track by finally earning his red belt in Karate.

episodes.title: Star on Wheels/Fetch
episodes.plot: Star on wheels: Marco teaches star how to ride a bike and she don't know how to stop. Fetch: star throws her wand,a dog won't give her wand back.

episodes.title: Star vs. Echo Creek/Wand to Wand
episodes.plot: Star goes on the run after accidentally crushing a police car. Star and Ludo struggle to get their new wands to work properly.

episodes.title: Starstruck/Camping Trip
episodes.plot: Star's biggest hero loses her mojo; King butterfly makes a surprise visit to Star during the Diaz family camping trip.

episodes.title: Starsitting/On the Job
episodes.plot: Star and Marco discover they have conflicting babysitting styles; Buffrog has to complete an important mission.

episodes.title: Goblin Dogs/By the Book
episodes.plot: Star and her friends want to get the best hot dogs in the Universe. Star and Marco want to convince Glossaryk to come out of a donut box.

episodes.title: Game of Flags/Girls' Day Out
episodes.plot: Star and Marco attend the annual Butterfly-Johansen family reunion. Star gets nominated for Mayor of Detention.

episodes.title: Sleepover/Gift of the Card
episodes.plot: It's Star's slumber party and Ponyhead suggests they play a game she brought from Mewni. Marco has to use a gift card that Star gave to him before it expires.

episodes.title: Friendenemies/Is Mystery
episodes.plot: Tom returns, but instead of vying for Star's company - he vies for Marco's! Buff Frog investigates what made the hole in the Mewman force field.

episodes.title: Hungry Larry/Spider with a Top Hat
episodes.plot: Star and Marco want to help Mr. Diaz have the scariest Haunted House on the block. Star's most entertaining spell wants to be a fighting spell instead.

episodes.title: Into the Wand/Pizza Thing
episodes.plot: Star wants to fix whatever is wrong with her wand. Marco and Ponyhead go out for pizza.

episodes.title: Page Turner/Naysaya
episodes.plot: Star tries to resist the temptation of reading a forbidden chapter in her Book of Spells. Marco grows a second head that blurts out his darkest secrets and insecurities.

episodes.title: Bon Bon the Birthday Clown
episodes.plot: Star has second thoughts about attending a dead clown séance instead of a school dance with Marco.

episodes.title: Raid the Cave/Trickstar
episodes.plot: Star wants to rescue Glossaryck and the Book of Spells from Ludo. Star sets out to prove that a party magician is a real magician.

episodes.title: Baby/Running with Scissors
episodes.plot: Star needs to be prepared for an evaluation that will determine whether she can stay on Earth. Marco misuses Star's dimensional scissors and gets himself into some trouble.

episodes.title: Mathmagic/The Bounce Lounge
episodes.plot: Strange things happens when Star refuses to solve a math problem/Star and her friends try to open The Bounce Lounge again.

episodes.title: Crystal Clear/The Hard Way
episodes.plot: Star comes to an understanding with an intemperate member of the Magic High Council. Ludo begins learning spells.

episodes.title: Heinous/All Belts Are Off
episodes.plot: Mrs. Heinous has return and now seeks revenge on Marco / Marco tries to prove himself to Sensei that he is a better person than Jeremy on Karate.

episodes.title: Collateral Damage/Just Friends
episodes.plot: Star must find her way to relive her schoolmates spirit after she accidentally broke the school mascot's statue. Star, Marco, and Jackie attend a "Love Sentence" concert.

episodes.title: Face the Music
episodes.plot: On Star's Song Day, Star and Marco work with songstrel Ruberiot to create a new song for the event.

episodes.title: Starcrushed
episodes.plot: To take her mind off her strained relationship with Marco, Star ditches the Diaz's summer break party and joins her friends in a much more dangerous event.

episodes.title: Star Comes to Earth/Party with a Pony
episodes.plot: An interstellar princess is exiled to earth and teams up with a teenage boy to battle villains from her universe.

episodes.title: Match Maker/School Spirit
episodes.plot: After failing a math test, Star tries to convince her teacher to change her grade. Star misunderstands when she hears that the school football team is going to "get slaughtered".

episodes.title: Monster Arm/The Other Exchange Student
episodes.plot: Monster Arm: Star accidentally turns Marco's arm into a monster arm when he has to do karate. The Other Exchange Student: Star is jealous when the family's best friend shows up.

episodes.title: Cheer Up Star/Quest Buy
episodes.plot: Marco tries to cheer up Star and ends up summoning Ludo and an army of monsters! Star and Marco venture to Quest Buy to get a new wand charger before Star's wand dies...forever.

episodes.title: Diaz Family Vacation/Brittney's Party
episodes.plot: Star forgets to get the Diazes an anniversary present, so she invites them on a trip to Mewni. Star crashes a birthday party but has to fight off Ludo's monsters.

episodes.title: Mewberty/Pixtopia
episodes.plot: Star starts sprouting hearts all over her body, the telltale sign of "Mewberty." Marco and his friends travel to a dimension of pixies and are forced to work in the Shard Mines.

episodes.title: Lobster Claws/Sleep Spells
episodes.plot: Star and Marco attempt to help Lobster Claws adjust to life on Earth. When Star "sleep spells," Marco tries to use psychology to cure her.

episodes.title: Blood Moon Ball/Fortune Cookies
episodes.plot: When Star attends Demon Prom with her ex-boyfriend, Marco follows to prevent Star from getting into trouble. Marco convinces Star that fortune cookies contain magical prophecies.

episodes.title: Freeze Day/Royal Pain
episodes.plot: Star must travel to the Plains of Time to convince Father Time to get back on his time wheel. Star's dad unexpectedly shows up at the Diaz house looking for a place to crash.

episodes.title: St. Olga's Reform School for Wayward Princesses
episodes.plot: Star must face her greatest fear and travel to St. Olga's Reform School for Wayward Princesses to bust out Flying Princess Pony Head for her birthday.

episodes.title: Mewnipendence Day/The Banagic Incident
episodes.plot: Star leads a battle reenactment as part of a Mewni Independence Day celebration. Star sees a commercial for a "magical" Earth product and sets off on her own to buy it.

episodes.title: Interdimensional Field Trip/Marco Grows A Beard
episodes.plot: Star leads a class field trip to a museum in another dimension. Star uses magic to help Marco grow a beard, but messes up the spell and causes it to grow out of control.

episodes.title: Storm the Castle
episodes.plot: When Marco gets kidnapped by Toffee and held as wand-ransom, Star enters into an unlikely alliance with Ludo: she'll help Ludo get his castle back, if he helps her save Marco.
